articles.title: Rugby-Flament and Mauvaka tries give France tight win over Argentina
articles.description: Argentina showed terrific spirit to launch a series of attacks in the last 10 minutes and closed the gap with a Mateo Carreras try but France had the last word with Jaminet's fifth penalty. "The balance is positive but we struggled to keep the ball and they made it tough in the first half," said captain Antoine Dupont.
articles.content: Second-half tries by debutant lock Thibaud Flament and hooker Peato Mauvaka and superb goalkicking by Melvyn Jaminet helped France to a 29-20 victory over a battling Argentina in a typically intense clash in the Stade de France on Saturday. Flament w... [3170 chars]

articles.title: France Edges Argentina 29-20 In Back-and-forth Thriller
articles.description: Lock Thibaud Flament scored a try on his test debut and hooker Peato Mauvaka came off the bench to make the game safe with his first at international level as France beat a muchchanged Argentina 2920 on Saturday.
articles.content:
PARIS: Lock Thibaud Flament scored a try on his test debut and hooker Peato Mauvaka came off the bench to make the game safe with his first at international level as France beat a much-changed Argentina 29-20 on Saturday.

articles.title: Argentina Pride march hails progress, calls for more rights laws
articles.description: Thousands of people on Saturday celebrated the progress made in Argentina by LGBTQ and womens rights groups with hours of music and marches in downtown Buenos Aires.
articles.content:
Revellers take part in the 30th Pride Parade in Buenos Aires city, on November 6, 2021. AFP

articles.title: Diego Maradona: Napoli pay tribute to Argentina legend with special shirt
articles.description: Maradona died on November 25 last year at the age of 60; the Argentina legend joined Napoli from Barcelona in 1984 and led them to their only two Serie A titles - in 1987 and 1990; celebratory shirt, named Maradona Game, will be worn in the games against Verona, Inter and Lazio.
articles.content:
Napoli will celebrate the life of Diego Maradona with a specially-designed shirt to be worn by players in the side’s three Serie A games to be played in November.

articles.title: Club chief says Man Utd man begged for transfer before transformative away-day display
articles.description: Manchester United striker Edinson Cavani personally phoned Boca Juniors' Juan Roman Riquelme to beg for a transfer last season, according to the former Argentina star.
articles.content:
Manchester United striker Edinson Cavani personally phoned Boca Juniors’ Juan Roman Riquelme to beg for a transfer last season, according to the former Argentina star.

articles.title: Ireland v Japan: Time, channel, talking points
articles.description: Ireland also host New Zealand and Argentina this month.
articles.content:
Ireland will bid to record a sixth successive win when they begin their autumn campaign against Japan in Dublin.
Saturday afternoon’s Aviva Stadium fixture precedes appointments with New Zealand and Argentina at the same venue in the next fortnight.

articles.title: Maradona drama misses the target
articles.description: Who was Diego Armando Maradona? Everyone knows the legend. The beautiful game was a lot more beautiful whenever a ball was at the miraculous feet of Argentina’s golden boy, who died last November, aged 60.
articles.content:

articles.title: Roberto Firmino ruled out for more than four weeks with hamstring injury
articles.description: Roberto Firmino, named last week to Brazil's squad for matches against Colombia and Argentina, sustained the injury during Liverpool’s 2-0 victory over Atletico Madrid in the UEFA Champions League.
articles.content:
Roberto Firmino will miss at least one month with Liverpool and upcoming World Cup qualifiers with Brazil because of a hamstring injury.

articles.title: France Excited By Ntamack Experiment At 12 Against Pumas
articles.description: Romain Ntamack has been paired at center with veteran Gael Fickou for France's rugby test against Argentina on Saturday, but it's his position next to slick flyhalf Matthieu Jalibert that excites.
articles.content:
